DescribeBackupPlans.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeBackupPlans
<Common request parameters>

{
    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-xxxxxxxx"
}

DescribeDBInstanceParameters.document: This example shows you how to get the list of modifiable parameters of an instance.
DescribeDBInstanceParameters.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeDBInstanceParameters
<Common request parameters>

{
    "DBInstanceId": "xx",
    "ParamName": "default_transaction_read_only"
}
DescribeDBInstanceParameters.output:
{
    "Response": {
        "Detail": [
            {
                "Advanced": true,
                "ClassificationCN": "Client Connection Defaults",
                "ClassificationEN": "Sets the default read-only status of new transactions.",
                "CurrentValue": "",
                "DefaultValue": "off",
                "EnumValue": [
                    "on",
                    "off"
                ],
                "ID": 59,
                "LastModifyTime": "",
                "Max": 0,
                "Min": 0,
                "Name": "default_transaction_read_only",
                "NeedReboot": false,
                "ParamDescriptionCH": "此参数控制每个新事务的是否为默认只读状态 。默认是off（读/写）",
                "ParamDescriptionEN": "Sets the default read-only status of new transactions.",
                "ParamValueType": "bool",
                "SpecRelated": false,
                "Unit": ""
            }
        ],
        "RequestId": "",
        "TotalCount": 1
    }
}
DescribeDBInstanceParameters.title: Getting the list of modifiable parameters of an instance

DescribeSlowQueryAnalysis.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeSlowQueryAnalysis
<Common request parameters>

{
    "StartTime": "2021-06-17 20:00:07",
    "EndTime": "2021-06-17 20:15:07",
    "Limit": 10,
    "Offset": 0,
    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-nbvqjlhf"
}
DescribeSlowQueryAnalysis.title: Analyzing the slow queries of an instance

DescribeSlowQueryList.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeSlowQueryList
<Common request parameters>

{
    "StartTime": "2021-07-22 10:00:07",
    "EndTime": "2021-07-27 20:15:07",
    "Limit": 10,
    "Offset": 0,
    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-nbvqjlhf"
}

ModifyBackupPlan.document: This example shows you how to modify the backup plan of the "postgres-xxxxxxxx" instance. According to the new backup plan, the instance will be backed up during 01:00:00-02:00:00 AM and the backup files will be retained for three days.
ModifyBackupPlan.title: Modifying the backup plan of an instance

ModifyDBInstanceDeployment.document: This example shows you how to modify the node deployment of the "postgres-abcd1234" instance so that the primary node resides in Guangzhou Zone 1 and the standby node in Guangzhou Zone 2.

ModifyDBInstanceDeployment.document: This example shows you how to modify the node deployment of the "postgres-abcd1234" instance so that both primary and standby nodes reside in Guangzhou Zone 3.
ModifyDBInstanceDeployment.title: Changing the instance deployment mode to single-AZ deployment
